Description.Text: Other amenities/services: Rooms with Direct dial phone, Bath, Music, Balcony or terrace, Groom service, Fridge in bungalows. Central heating, Lounge & video, Laundry & ironing service, Fax facilities, 3 tennis courts, Basket, Volley, Baby sitting, Children's playground. Conference room capacity: 60 persons.
Important place or monument close to the hotel: Located at the entrance of Molyvos, 1km from the center of the village, on the beach.
